code: import axios from"axios";import{appConstants}from"../constants/constant";export var getPayments=function getPayments(uid){var getPaymentsPromise=axios.get("".concat(appConstants.API,"/paymentHistories/").concat(uid));return{type:appConstants.GET_PAYMENT_HISTORY,payload:getPaymentsPromise};};export var putPayments=function putPayments(paymentHistory){var putPaymentsPromise=axios.put("".concat(appConstants.API,"/paymentHistories"),paymentHistory);return{type:appConstants.PUT_PAYMENT_HISTORY,payload:putPaymentsPromise};};
